about.title: About EasyLink
about.subtitle: The easiest way to share your files
about.description: EasyLink was created to simplify file sharing and viewing. Our platform allows you to upload, share, and view files directly in the browser, making collaboration easier and more efficient.
about.missionText: To provide a simple, secure, and efficient way to share files with anyone, anywhere.
about.teamText: We are a dedicated team of developers and designers passionate about creating tools that make your work easier.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or need support? Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to EasyLink. By using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service.

usage.title: 1. Usage of Service
usage.content: EasyLink provides file sharing and viewing services. You are responsible for all content you upload and share through our platform.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. EasyLink cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage from your failure to comply with this security obligation.

content.title: 3. User Content
content.content: You retain all rights to your content. By uploading content to EasyLink, you grant us a license to host and share that content according to your settings.

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited Content
prohibited.content: You may not use EasyLink for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not violate any laws in your jurisdiction.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.content: EasyLink may terminate or suspend your account at any time, with or without cause, without prior notice or liability.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes to these terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about EasyLink
faq.notFound: Didn't find what you were looking for?

fileFormats.question: What file formats do you support?

answer.intro: EasyLink supports a wide variety of file formats, including:

items.html: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for static websites
items.zip: ZIP files containing your complete website
items.documents: PDFs, images (JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG) and other documents

answer.conclusion: Our paid plans offer support for larger files and more content types.

linkDuration.question: How long will my link stay online on the free plan?
linkDuration.answer: On the free plan, your link will remain active for 7 days. After this period, it will be automatically deactivated. To keep your links active for longer, we recommend upgrading to one of our paid plans, which offer permanent storage as long as your subscription is active.

wordpress.question: Do you support WordPress or similar CMS?
wordpress.answer: EasyLink is optimized for hosting static sites, we don't offer support for WordPress or other CMS that require PHP or databases. However, if you export your WordPress site as static HTML (using plugins like Simply Static), you can host that content on our platform without issues.

php.question: Do you support PHP?
php.answer: No, currently EasyLink does not support PHP or other server languages. Our platform is optimized for static content, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. If you need dynamic functionality, we recommend using APIs and serverless services that can be integrated with your static site.

publicAccess.question: Are my links publicly accessible?
publicAccess.answer: By default, all EasyLink links are publicly accessible through the generated URL. However, in the Solo and Pro plans, we offer the option to protect your links with a password, allowing you to control who can access your content. You can also choose not to list your content in search engines.

ecommerce.question: Do you support e-commerce sites?
ecommerce.answer: EasyLink can host static e-commerce sites that use third-party services for payment processing, such as Stripe, PayPal, or other checkout solutions. You can create an online store using frameworks like Next.js or Gatsby with headless commerce integrations like Shopify, Snipcart, or Commerce.js.

support.question: What's the fastest way to get in touch if I need help?
support.answer: The fastest way to get help is through our support chat available on the website, which operates during business hours (9am to 6pm, Monday to Friday). You can also send an email to support@easylink.live and we'll respond within 24 hours. Pro plan customers have access to priority support with a guaranteed response time of 4 hours.

moneyBack.question: How does the 7-day money-back guarantee work?
moneyBack.answer: All our paid plans come with a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service for any reason, simply contact our support team within 7 days of purchase, and we'll process a full refund without asking questions. Note that the guarantee applies only to your first subscription, not to renewals.

cancel.question: Can I cancel at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time directly from your control panel. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. After cancellation, you will continue to have access to your plan's features until the end of the current billing period.

afterCancel.question: What happens after I cancel?
afterCancel.answer: After cancellation, your account will remain active until the end of the current billing period. After that, your account will be downgraded to the free plan, and any features that exceed the free plan limits will become inaccessible. Your projects will remain in our system for 30 days after the end of your subscription, giving you time to back up your content or reactivate your subscription if you change your mind.
